item.title: The Year of TiramisÃ¹
item.description:
2023 shall be known as the year of TiramisÃ¹.

I got to swim with dolphins. Incredible even if a lot less dramatic than how I always dreamt about it.

Read a few good books, but none I enjoyed like re-reading Snow Crash & The Diamond Age.

Learned skill/technique of the year: Macro dieting and Renaissance Periodization - Lost weight & built muscle while enjoying food everyday

Notable bookmarks for the year:

Balderdash

Money Stuff

Rootless Root - The Unix Koans of Master Foo

Republic of Rose Island

4K Rivers - Dan Coe Carto

Antithesis

Veilid

Internet Artifacts - Neal.fun

Untitled Goose Game

White Gold

BEEF

Triangle of Sadness

King of Stonks

The Bear

Black Mirror - Joan Is Awful

CICADA 3301

(HOPE 2022) Secrets of Social Media PsyOps

(HOPE 2022) void loop () - Minecraft as My Musical Instrument

Sparks of AGI: early experiments with GPT-4

An Introduction to Residuality Theory - Barry O’Reilly

Notable quotes:

“Proximity to death amplifies the flavor of life”

“Happy people donâ€™t have the best things, they make the best things” (Crumpet Cafe)

“Enough people suck to give you the illusion that everyone sucks” (Dan Savage)

“If youâ€™re not growing, youâ€™re dying. If youâ€™re not searching, youâ€™re lost.”

“The bad news about taking responsibility is now it’s your fault. The good news about taking responsibility is now you can do something about it.”

“It gets easier. You gotta do it every day, thatâ€™s the hard part. But it gets easier every day.”
